page.title: 12Housing in Barrhead
page.content: Local Authority{housing}accounts for two thirds of the town's houses. Most of the new houses built recently have been flats of 3 and 4 storeys. There is only one high rise block of flats in the town. Old houses have been modernised. { Private developments}have been built on the perimeters of the town. Current new building is concentrated in small pockets of land within the town. { Smaller houses}and flats are being built to accommodate single persons, retired couples and couples with no children. The market for this type of housing is expanding. Four {sheltered housing}complexes have been built to cater for elderly people. These are well designed and equipped to meet the needs of the elderly.
